item.title: Audiobook struggles Couldn't get through this chapter without breaking down. 15 years. My best friend. The one who was there for every low point, every struggle, every 3am run when I couldn't sleep. She got me through everything. And then I had to let her

item.title: Top comment on this video is @Eli Wehbe and my next challenge. Vote. 2,900+ votes: "Run 100 miles handcuffed together." So we did. Every 10 miles: @Ketone-IQ Every step: coordinated chaos Every bathroom break: awkward But the fuel? Solid. Clean energy.
item.description: Top comment on this video is @Eli Wehbe and my next challenge. Vote. 2,900+ votes: "Run 100 miles handcuffed together." So we did. Every 10 miles: @Ketone-IQ Every step: coordinated chaos Every bathroom break: awkward But the fuel? Solid. Clean energy.

item.title: Quick update on the process (and why it's so hard). First, thank you for all the therapist recommendations. I'm following up on them. This is a worker's compensation case. In California, PTSD is a presumptive condition for firefighters, police, and parame
item.description: Quick update on the process (and why it's so hard). First, thank you for all the therapist recommendations. I'm following up on them. This is a worker's compensation case. In California, PTSD is a presumptive condition for firefighters, police, and parame

item.title: Social media loves highlights. Finish lines. Buckles. Smiles. But that's not the whole story. If we're going to break the stigma around mental health, we have to talk about the hard parts too. The struggles behind the scenes. The days when showing up feel

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
